Home::desktop.summary: The login page has redundant elements, inconsistent spacing, and poor visual hierarchy that reduce usability and professionalism.

issues.location: logo section and main title area
issues.description: Logo section and main title both display "FLIPPERHUB", creating visual redundancy. The main title should be a distinct heading.
issues.recommendation: Remove the main title "FLIPPERHUB" and replace it with a unique heading (e.g., "Login to FlipperHub") to establish clear hierarchy

issues.description: Subtitle "Tournament Management System" is too small and lacks emphasis, making it less noticeable than the main title.
issues.recommendation: Increase the font size of the subtitle to 16px or larger and apply a subtle style (e.g., lighter weight) to differentiate it from the main title

issues.description: The "Remember me" checkbox has a small touch target (likely <48x48px), making it difficult to tap on mobile.
issues.recommendation: Increase the touch target size to at least 48x48px by expanding the checkbox area or adding padding

issues.location: between password field and "Remember me" checkbox
issues.description: Insufficient vertical spacing between the password field and the "Remember me" checkbox reduces readability.

issues.recommendation: Make the main title a distinct heading (e.g., different font size/weight) to establish hierarchy

issues.description: The "Remember me" checkbox has a small touch target, making it inaccessible on mobile.
issues.recommendation: Increase the touch target size to at least 48x48px

issues.description: The "Forgot password?" link is placed next to the checkbox without consistent alignment, causing visual inconsistency.
issues.recommendation: Align the "Forgot password?" link with the checkbox (e.g., vertically centered) and ensure consistent spacing

issues.description: The "LOGIN" button is positioned too close to the form elements, reducing perceived separation.
issues.recommendation: Add 16px of vertical spacing between the form elements and the "LOGIN" button

issues.description: The main title "FLIPPERHUB" is the same as the logo text, so it lacks visual distinction.

issues.description: The logo section (dark rectangle) is too large, dominating the top space without clear purpose.
issues.recommendation: Reduce the size of the logo section or integrate it more seamlessly with the main content

Profile::desktop.summary: The login form has visual alignment and spacing issues that reduce usability, with minor typography adjustments needed for better hierarchy.

issues.description: The CREATE NEW USER section is disproportionately large compared to EXISTING USERS, creating an unbalanced visual flow
issues.recommendation: Adjust section heights to balance content importance

issues.description: The Role dropdown has no visible options, making it unclear what roles are available
issues.recommendation: Show a list of roles (e.g., "User", "Admin") in the dropdown

issues.description: The note "Admin-created users are pre-verified" under Email (Optional) is misleading, as it implies email is required for verification
issues.recommendation: Clarify that email is optional and pre-verification applies to admin-created users

issues.description: The Email (Optional) field's placeholder user@example.com is not clearly marked as optional
issues.recommendation: Add (Optional) next to the field label for clarity

issues.description: Placeholder text "Search by username, display name, or email..." is overly verbose and reduces readability
issues.recommendation: Shorten to "Search..." or "Search users"

issues.description: Vertical spacing between form fields (e.g., between Email (Optional) and Password) is inconsistent
issues.recommendation: Standardize vertical spacing between input fields

issues.description: Table headers lack sufficient emphasis (e.g., bold text), making it hard to distinguish columns
issues.recommendation: Bold the header text for better visual hierarchy

issues.description: Inconsistent spacing between Reset Password and Delete buttons within the Actions column
issues.recommendation: Align buttons vertically and add consistent spacing

issues.description: The CREATE NEW USER heading uses uppercase text without clear hierarchy, reducing scannability
issues.recommendation: Use a larger font size or bold weight for the heading

issues.description: Back to Dashboard and Logout buttons are too close together, reducing usability
issues.recommendation: Increase horizontal spacing between these buttons
